meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a rush
meanings.sent1: The tall, thin grass in the field had a rushlike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the rushlike movement of the river.
meanings.sent3: The rushlike swaying of the trees in the wind was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed behind her in a rushlike manner as she ran.
meanings.sent5: The rushlike sound of the wind through the reeds created a peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Moving or acting quickly and with urgency
meanings.sent1: The rushlike pace of the emergency responders saved lives.
meanings.sent2: She made a rushlike decision to catch the last train.
meanings.sent3: The rushlike behavior of the squirrel startled the birds nearby.
meanings.sent4: His heart beat in a rushlike rhythm as he approached the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The rushlike arrival of the storm caught everyone off guard.
